skills.skill: Cisco Certified Technician Routing and Switching

duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, operate, and maintain voice telecommunications network circuits and equipment.
Verify service by testing circuits, equipment, and alarms; and identify, correct, or escalate problems.
Document network by labeling and routing cables and recording configuration diagrams and specifications.
Maintain safe work environment by following codes, standards, and legal regulations.
Update job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities and reading technical publications.
Enhance department and organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different request and exploring opportunities to add value to job accomplishments.
Update work orders/incidents on time with detailed work notes

education_certification.credential: One to three years of related telecommunications experience
Prior experience with VoIP (Cisco and Avaya)
Minimum of Cisco Certified Technician Routing and Switching
